title: Here's a reading list of 20 articles on using Graph Neural Networks (GNNs
container-title: for Natural Language Processing (NLP) tasks, up to 2021

title: **"Semi-Supervised Classification with Graph Convolutional Networks"** by Thomas Kipf and Max Welling
note: - This foundational paper introduces Graph Convolutional Networks (GCNs), which have been widely applied in NLP.

title: **"Graph Neural Networks: A Review of Methods and Applications"** by Jie Zhou et al
- A comprehensive review that includes applications of GNNs in NLP
**"Graph Convolutional Networks for Text Classification"** by Yao, Liang, et al
- This paper applies GCNs to text classification tasks
**"Text Level Graph Neural Network for Text Classification"** by Zhang, Meng, et al
- Proposes a text-level GNN for improved text classification
**"Graph Neural Networks for Natural Language Processing: A Survey"** by Wu, Zonghan, et al
note: - A survey focusing on the application of GNNs in NLP.

title: **"Exploiting Rich Syntactic Information for Semantic Parsing with Graph-to-Sequence Model"** by Zhang, Yue, et al
- Uses GNNs for semantic parsing
**"Graph Neural Networks for Named Entity Recognition with Syntactic Dependency"** by Lin, Yankai, et al
- Applies GNNs to named entity recognition using syntactic dependencies
**"Jointly Learning to Align and Translate with Transformer Models"** by Wang, Biao, et al
note: - Integrates GNNs with transformers for machine translation.

title: **"Syntax-Aware Aspect Level Sentiment Classification with Graph Attention Networks"** by Huang, Binxuan, et al
- Uses GNNs for sentiment analysis with a focus on syntax
**"Graph Convolution over Pruned Dependency Trees Improves Relation Extraction"** by Guo, Zhijiang, et al
- Enhances relation extraction using GNNs over dependency trees
**"Enhancing AMR-to-Text Generation with Dual Graph Representations"** by Song, Linfeng, et al
note: - Utilizes GNNs for Abstract Meaning Representation (AMR) to text generation.

title: **"Graph-based Neural Networks for Event Factuality Prediction using Syntactic and Semantic Structures"** by Lee, Jinhyuk, et al
note: - Applies GNNs to event factuality prediction.

title: **"Graph Neural Networks for Social Recommendation"** by Wu, Lichen, et al
note: - Although focused on recommendation, it provides insights into GNNs for social data, relevant for NLP.

title: **"Graph Neural Networks for Cross-Domain Text Classification"** by Li, Pengfei, et al
- Explores GNNs for cross-domain text classification
**"Graph Neural Networks for Knowledge Graph Completion"** by Schlichtkrull, Michael, et al
- Discusses GNNs for completing knowledge graphs, a task closely related to NLP
**"Graph Neural Networks for Document-Level Sentiment Classification"** by Sun, Kai, et al
note: - Focuses on document-level sentiment analysis using GNNs.

title: **"Graph Neural Networks for Answer Selection in Community Question Answering"** by Zhang, Shuai, et al
- Applies GNNs to answer selection tasks
**"Graph Neural Networks for Multi-Document Summarization"** by Li, Wenhao, et al
- Uses GNNs for summarizing multiple documents
**"Graph Neural Networks for Text Generation from Abstract Meaning Representation"** by Beck, Daniel, et al
- Discusses the use of GNNs for text generation from AMR
**"Graph Neural Networks for Coreference Resolution"** by Wu, Yuchen, et al
- Applies GNNs to the task of coreference resolution
These articles cover a range of NLP tasks and demonstrate the versatility of GNNs in this domain
